name: HUMANS CONNECT
description:
HUMANS CONNECT



An action-packed Boss-Rush Game, where you can control one of three characters and beat a boss to reveal the story of each character. Each character has a unique set of moves and abilities. To unlock all the characters mythos and the lore of the game, you must first beat all bosses using all characters.

Character Description



NightWolf:
A loyal wolf pet-like creature with a purpose of protecting his masters from any harm.



Julia:
Unaware of the power lurking inside her, Julia is a brave young girl, always willing to risk her life for others.



Inpu:
A creature that resembles Anubis, with a mysterious purpose. Inpu stumbles on Julia and suddenly decides to take her away because he sensed something dangerous from her.


This game has been entirely developed by a Single Person.
